UlMi{Zt|Uh6(Jr]U-@Rj.text: Current Controls:Arrow Keys: MovementZ: Interact / Progress textX: Hold X to speed up textThings to add:-Better mapping and initializing-Better background systems in general-Code simplification wherever possible-functional doors-functional beds-notes-keys-chests-locked doors/chests-special locks-moving blades-ladders-quest items-walking animationThis is going to be a good game.Known bug:When using 2.0, pressing z while applicable and pressing an arrow key at the same time will perform both actions.Please comment other bugs you see.
